q: 2011 release. The online software targets what Microsoft CEO Steve Ballmer called the heart of almost every successful: Sales professionals. Microsoft Dynamics CRM redefines by offering an industry-leading product that is fully embracing the cloud, Steve Ballmer said. The Microsoft chief pointed to a familiar user experience that enables collaboration, streamlines processes, and accesses real-time as key competitive benefits of Microsoft Dynamics CRM.
